name: I Will Show Your Face
description:
I Will Show Your Face is a 2D top-down strategy and survival games where you kill zombies with their OWN FACE. Set up the environment, use your mirror and reflect light from light sources into it, so the zombies can see their own face and dissolve themselves! 

Enjoy the combination of strategy, puzzle, and survival with CREATOR MODE and SURVIVAL MODE. Feel the zombie vibes!

Controls :

  • CREATOR MODE
    Use WASD to move camera and MOUSE CLICK to adjust light sources and mirrors.
  • SURVIVAL MODE
    USE WASD to move the character and MOUSE MOVE to rotate the character.

This game is submitted for IGSI Game Jam 2021 Kategori Pelajar.
